Yesus yae weumi, “Ma hila rabo sawi ko ebi ken wanen bae o ha kabande waungele, ‘Raweibo ndi bumoko nolone yeisebe,’ na hului raweuboube yeufebeube.
“Ro nde yae na yebaei bubaeise ara bura meube mo weungele, ‘Mei na hibi raman mei aneiko!’?
Nebei mekai ban sele. Na hele beufoube weungele, ‘Eraman koloisoko. Wambelae foi hireko, ndane mo hebewonde. Reyae raman andekonde baensonde mo, nebeisa weyae aneukonde.’
Yebaei bubaei, abu ako, nebei naei wanen mokonatebe, nebeibe na rowa ‘helen foi’ ewei, rabuhine ban na baka ranne kaliare mo mokowate.
Nebei sului mbai mayae Allah a ukembe kalia mokombe baensonde hee, elembe ‘Maei ukeume kaliare mo mokowande. Meyae yeise raeiboi ban yebaei bubaeibe nekande.’ ”
Yesus Yerusalem yore ewole hee, Samaria kani bele Galilea kani bele hee randa ewole.

Yo mbaise eweufike mo, ro me bee na u bauwau wae molayekene Yesusle bokore mewate. Nebei hee ro miyae u bene nekewaimi u bauwaufe era buloone foisi-foisi foyatene, nda yo nahaufa hebaiboke kaenainyekoke,
“Yesus, Tuhan, maere yanekoi yase yae ei meimehawei!”
Yesus nebei yore ereumikoke mo weumi, “Eme imam-imamde mauwa onomi yaraukokere emmikelembo.” Nibine alainyekoke ewate mo, onomi yaraikoke.
Nebei me bee nolora ro mbai na uwa onomi yeuboke erewoungene, bukeufike meke Allahre buma nekai kaewounge.
Meke Yesusle oro bene be are neke, helen foi uwounge. Nda Samariana ro mbai mo meke. ((Yahudi yoni-yoni Samaria ro miyaere ele moise woke yo yae elewate.))
Nebeinye, Yesus yae weumi, “Ro me bee lonbe, onomire yaeiboke yo? Na mehine keli bele makeinya ekate?
Rahene nda ele moinye robe, nembai mo bukeufike meke Allahre buma mekeukolounge?”
Nebeisa Yesus nda rore weunge, “Ainyu eye. Wa hila rabo yae onomi ikete!”
Ya mbai Farisi holona yo hiwa mekate Yesusre hinainye makei hee yae Allah Naei yo waku mennembonde. Yesus yae weumi, “Allah Naei yo waku mennembonde hee ro miyae nda ijoko hele ereiboi.

Nane merau ro miyae hiwa yae ware ewei, ‘Mennerembo nda niyae!’ Hiwa yo yae nane merau ewei, ‘Ndi nare!’ Rabuhine ban, Allah Naei yo waku mai kena u einye honole.” ((Yesusle me kelee u keleene nekate niyae.))
Nebeisa Yesus na moisa orowate yore weumi, “Bena ya mendene mayae kena kaban kombe Reyae Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyaere erensebombere, nebeibe mayae Rare ereiboi sului.
Nebei heene ro miyae a hira kaenenate, ‘Ndare erennoko! Ndire erennoko!’ Naei are oboroijae ehakoijae hele.
Wili wanen yakune wele na hehe nda kani kela nemene naeikoyole wanen mbai Raei merele ya.
Na bere holo Reyae beko nekai hubarengkonde, nebeisa nda heena ro miyae Rare moi bulenaisebonde.
“Raei uwa yakarebonde heene, Allahle yendo kayaalo Nuh bere nekewole hee wanen.
Nebei heene nekewate yo raman anewate, miyae yarowate iwaimi, ya-ya nebei hului mo kaimekate Nuh kai kaban einye meufileukoke heene. Nebeisa bumae yae meke yarowole bune ayaneuboke.
“Nebei wanen mbai Lotle heene, ro miyae raman bu anayeke, rambun yoni-yoni nai haeyeke yarayeke, heke mokayeke, imae haeyeke.
Lot Sodom yora meukuke mo, nebei ya mbai i yakura oke, ro miyae nemene howole haiwole.
“Nebei wanen mbai Raei merele yane.
Nebei ya ro miyae imae bumane hebenatena, nerambun yaroikoise imae eise oijae. Nebei sului mbai hekena mokonate yo imaere ebukeijae hele.
Lotle miyaene mo bene nekenayembe. Nerambun u bene nekewainyene moise yae be beufoke bae, hae rukare yeuboke.
Nde na walire hole molonnebonderena, herende bae Allahle nanembainye einyekei. Nde na wali Allahle me einye kinyennebondena, herende bae Allahle nanembainye eneinyekende.
Reyae wamale, nebei reniai ro bee a honson mbainye ijongku hononete, hire rowende, hi nukennebonde.
Miyae bee melune yalenete, hire rowende, hi nukennebonde.
Ro bee hekene eneimokonde, hi rowende, hi nukennebonde.”
Yesus na moisa orowate yo yae hinainye, “Tuhan, makeinye?”
Yesus nda a ahuneuboke weumi, “Makeinye makeinye era kaka honate, aye abara mali hubayeikoyate.”
Yesus Na moisa orowate yo na hibi-hibi yae Allahre ebeli bonainyende nane merau rabo ban nekatere kelemmile naeise Yesus nda ahuba ahuneuboke huwoumi,
“Yo mbainye hakim mbai Allahre fe efaeyei nekeweke, rore miyaere nde ban beweke.
Nebei yo mbainye miyaenale (rora moloufake) mbai roko yae roko yae nebei hakimbe bokore eibeiso meibeiso koweke weunge, ‘Raei yokeijo beko mokoufeboke rambunde benen ijen mae mokoibo!’
“Ya-ya yae oroumekere hakim nebei miyaenalere ahi yae mo weungemeke. Nebeisa hakim u bene nekainyekoke mo na kena eisa elele, ‘Reyae Allahre fe efaeyei, rore miyaere nde ban beyale.
Nebeibe nda miyaenale rare hileiko-hileiko koimeyeufene, ninae hakorembon. Ehakoiboinya, na hibi-hibi mo orommende, reyae ijongku foi ohonoiboi korele.’ ”
Nebeisa Yesus yae weumi, “Nda hakim nde ban beyele yae elele a boraube.
Naendae wanen, Allah Naei eleuboke wekeumi ro miyae nebei wanen reniai rai hileiko-hileiko kainyeweube yore ehakoiboi? Hakoiboi naeise wahenare, ya hendere yae wemmile?

Reyae wamale, Allah nebei ro miyae naeise u hale aere olende! Nebeibe Reyae, Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyae, roko bee nendo merele heene, naendae wanen, Rare hila rabore halaeise yo hubaimale?”
Ro miyae hiwa nauware wali himalainyeboke yae erainye, nebeibe hiwa yore u mekai beko bele yae eraimi. Nebei yore kelemmile naeise Yesus nda ahuba ahuneuboke huwoumi,
“Ro bee ebelire boneinyele naeise Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyaene ekete. Ro hi Farisi holona, na hi kiyae pajakre arilewole ro.

Farisi holona ro eufebeunguke hebele naei naeise elele, ‘Allah, reyae nebei ro miyae hosoro wanen banne Ware helen foi sele wawale. Reyae yoko ebaeyei, beko omokoyei, ro naei miyae uwa mbainye ohonoi nane merau raei wali ndi ro pajakre arileyele kiyaele wanen ban.
Reyae mon mbai roko bee yarele me heiboyale nekeikoyale. Nane merau raei roibure hobeyaise rambun me bee kayeero Allah yeyawale.’

“Nebeibe pajakre arileyele kiyae yae, nahaufa hebeunguke na be kanire beufoke na beko mokowolene kena beko hubawounge yae elele, ‘Allah, reyae beko bako bele ro, rare yanekoi yase yae ei haweufele.’ ”

Yesus yae weumi, “Reyae wamale hokolo bee imaere ewote, pajakre yaroyele kiyaebe Allah yae nare wali himaloungeboke ro yae me baeungeboke, nebeibe Farisi holona kiyaere me ebaei. Nauware kaete ro miyaere ane enaimikolonde. Nauware ane koloyainye ro miyaere bumane emmikande.”
Ro miyae na wayeu fa-fa mere herawemmile naeise yarowaimi Yesusle bokore mewate. Yesus na moisa orowate yo nebei wanen erewatene, nebei ro miyae mewatere a yae yarewaimi.

Nebeibe Yesus nebei fa-fa ebibire kaenewoumi wa elele, “Raei bokore nebei fa-fa ebibi nendon waemmihi mai! Nare ahemmimae! Rabuhine ban Raei me kelee u keleene nekate holona ro miyae fa-fa u mekai wanen nekate.
Nana heselebe wamale, nde yae fa-fa naeko nenake weimi are boroyeumi wanen Reyae wamaele are oboroinya, Raei me kelee u keleene nekate ro miyae holone eyeiboi sului.”
Yahudi yun-jun nekatena ro mbai meke Yesusre hineunge, “Guru, u mekai foi bele Kiyae, reyae rahe me ube mokorebonde wali hena eitoufele?”
Nebeibe Yesus yae weunge, “Rahene weyae rare u mekai foi bele yae warae? U mekai foi bele ro miyae u, Allah nembai u mekai foi bele nekele.

Allah yae Musare ukeunge wali heere foloukoke are weyae isaeiwoyae, Ro miyae bele miyae ro bele uwa mbainye ohonoijae, ro miyae ohoijae, yoko ebaeijae, ro miyae naei ro nendon naeise eheyeijae, araise anare be hinenaimile.”
Nda ro yae weunge, “Nebei nemene fomene na hokolora reyae mokoyale.”

Nebei wanen eleukoke borokene, benen Yesus yae weunge, “Mbai sele honole niyae weyae mokoubonde hele. Waei rambun-rambun nemene naise heukonde, nebei roi keren ban nale ban yore waheumikonde. Nebeisa surgana hemboni relabe waeise enaijembonde. Nebeisa mele Rare hakoufebonde orayende.”
Yesus yae uwounge a boroukokera na hemboni rela helen selene na kena beko kaban kowole.
Yesus ereungekoke wa elele, “Hemboni mali rela mali ro miyae Raei me kelee u keleene nekate yo holo eise eyeiboise kabenainyekonde.
Unta jarum bulure nendon eweufiube, hemboni rela nolone nekeyate yo, Raei me kelee u keleene nekate yo holo eise neyae eyeiboise kabenainyekonde.”
Ro miyae hiwa Yesus nebei a wanen eleukoke borokainyelene hinainye, “Nebei wanen mae eleyaena, makei yo yae wali hena bona enaiyaronde?”
Yesus yae weumi, “Ro miyae yae omokoikoi sului rambunde Allah na hului mokonde!”
Nebeisa mo Petrus yae weunge, “Eramae, Ware mo hakomayete naeise maei rambun nemene nukewande haiwande.”
Yesus yae weumi, “Nde yae na imae obe, na miyae fa, naka baeke, nenake naeko, Raei me kelee u keleene yo holo aerene nukemmibondena,
nda kanine neyae nebei hului mbai benen helen yaronde nane merau herendera wali hena bona endowende.”

Yesus na moisa orowate yo me bee oro nen bee bele yore na mo-mo arileumihike mo weumi, “Eyae Yerusalem yore emalere. Reyae Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyaele naeise Allahle yenjo kayaayo homone molaikoke hului benatere.
Allahre onaeinye ro miyae naei mene Rare kinyenaisebonde. Neyae aukaka konaisele, a beko ungaisele, eki hesere roronaisele, rahuae bonaisekondera honaisebonde.
Nebeibe ya name mo Reyae walerebonde.”
Yesus nebei a merau elewokere na moisa orowate yo hi yae ha yae isaeyeiboi. Na mekai harawounge nebei yore felewoumi, onewate rahe abe elewole.
Yesus Yerikho yo nobewounge yae, ro mbai ijoko kumba nibi enene nekewole a ri-tinye riyewole.
Ro miyae helen sele mate borowolene hineumi, “Nda rahe erabe yeuboke?”
Nebei yo wainye, “Nazaretna Yesusbe mele.”
Nebei a boroukokene nebei ro yae kaenele, “Yesus, Ondofolo Daudle kelu! Rare yanekoi yase yae ei haweufele ya!”
Nebei ro hilembonde naeise na bena hebate ro miyae a elae yae haewainye, nebeibe neyae kali laeisi-laeisi kowole, “Ondofolo Daudle kelu! Rare yanekoi yase yae ei haweufele ya!”
Yesus hebeunguke mo ukeumi nebei ro yawainyehoke. Naei bokore yae meke mo, Yesus yae hineunge,
“Waei kena koyae rahebe ware mokoreibotere?”
Nda ro yae weunge, “Tuhan, raei kena kaban sele koyale benen ijoko ererelere.”
Yesus weunge, “Mana onomi rowei! Wa hila rabo elae randa nda foi roukae.”
Nebei ro na ijoko na hibi onomi yeuboke. Nebeisa Yesusre hakoungeboke ewote Allahre buma kaeungeke. Hebewate yo nebei wanen erewatene, naeise naeise Allahre buma kaewainye.
Yesus Yerikho yo einye eweufike oroweke yae,
nebei yona ro mbai na ro Zakeus, hembonilo relalo pajakre arilate holona yo naei yun.
Yesus ndebe ijoko yae erennebondere, nebeibe Zakeus oro fone nane merau ro miyae helen selene, Zakeus Yesusre erennebondere relewounge an.
Nebeinye ro miyae mate nolora bere yae hakauboke o bumare neke yeuketeke, Yesus keleera mende na hului hilonnele.
Yesus meke nebei ijenne mo bumare euweke Zakeusbe kanekeunge weunge, “Zakeus, hasale yae oi akoibo! Reyae nda ya waei imaene erensindere.”
Nebeinye Zakeus u hale me hale owakouboke, Yesusre yaweungehoke na rei bele naei imaere ewote.
Nebei erewate ro miyae na a mulun-mulun bele elewate, ro wali beko lonbe naei imaere ete!

Zakeus Yesusle naei imaene ekete mo, hebeunguke Yesusre weunge, “Tuhan, raei hemboni rela nolora waherekondere reufi ro miyae keren ban nale ban yore isemikondere. Ro miyae nde nde reyae ame-ame yaneungekale kiyae, raeisa nare berensonde raka keli isengkonde!”
Yesus yae weunge, “Nda heene Allah ware hole molokokete, rabuhine ban Abrahambe wanen weyae Allah a ukete hului mokobokae.
Reyae, Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyae, ro miyae wali nibi mekaisorate yore baeimeyamaele nane merau hole eremimolonde.”

A elewolene namman nare borainye mo, Yesus nda ahuba ahuneuboke huwoumi, rabuhine ban Yerusalem yore Yesus naei nobaeinyekoke nane merau ro miyae u bene nekewaimile Yesus Yudea kani naei Ondofolore menjembonde hee nobeungeboke.
Yesus yae weumi, “Ro mbai ondofolo riyana kani hire ewole. Ende ondofolore enjembondere oro umau heraungainyebondera benen bukensinde na yore yande mende.

Namman kulun ewei ei mo, na imae einya kaliare mokate ro me bee kaeneumiko mekate. Naeise naeise roi roibu oko name hobenaikonde hului yeumikoke. Nebeisa mo weumi, ‘Reyae nukerembombe heera nda roi foi yae mokombe mende reyae bukerehinde merele.’
“Nebei yona ro miyae hiwa nda rore ikele kowainyene ro hiwa ukaimile na moisa enate, ungainyele, ‘Meyae kena ban nda ro maei ondofolore nekendere.’

“Nebeibe nebei ro ondofolore nekende kiyae oro umau herawainyeboke, bukeufike naei yore ewole. Nebei roise waheumikoke yore kaeneumikoke mekate isaeise rowendere naennaen hului na roi benen baraikoke.
“Ro mbai nendo meke weunge, ‘Ondo, nebei roi ikarae mokoungebokale me beere yeuboke.’
“Nebei ondofolo yae weunge, ‘Foi sele, weyae abu ako foi. Rambun ebibine rabo halawale. Nebei aerene ndi yo yan me bee waei me einye kinyereibote.’
“Ro bee nendo meke weunge, ‘Ondo, nebei roi ikarae mokoungebokale maehae mbaise yeuboke.’
“Nebei kiyaere nebei ondofolo yae weunge, ‘Yo yan maehae mbai waei me einye kinyereibote.’
“Ro name nendo meke weunge, ‘Ondo, nda wa roi niyae reyae malone ruleufikale honoumeke.
Weyae nansau felene, reyae buhae hokowoufe. Waei banbe roweyae, weyae omoloikoi ijen ani eisokoyae.’
“Nebei ondofolo yae weunge, ‘Weyae ro beko hele! Waei are eleukokae huluinye mana ware mokoreibotere. Weyae waeisaei reyae ro nansau, raei banbe reyae rowale, reyae omoloyei ijenne ani eisokale.
Rahene weyae roi meli mekai bele ro miyaere eyei? Emiyemae, neyae nebei yo rambun hi yae mokouboube roi barauboube. Mele mo helen wanen mae rowele.’
“Nebei ondofolo nebeinye hebate yore weumi, ‘Na mena roi rowen, mbai nendo kiyaere yenne.’
“Nebei ro miyae hebate yae wainye, ‘Neyae naei helen sele.’

“Nebeibe benen nebei ondofolo yae weumi, ‘Reyae mare wamale, nde na mena bele honate kiyae benen helen sele baranainyele. Nde na mena ebibi yobounge kiyae, nebei rambun-rambun ebibi yobounge nemene kuyenainyekonde.
Mana reyae ninae ondofolore heberelere rare ahi yae elewate yo yawemmibo mai. Ra bene nemene hongko hayengko!’ ”
Nebei ahubara huwoumikoke baeufoke mo, Yesus bere neuboke Yerusalem yore ewate.
Betfage yo bele Betania yo bele Zaitun moko kelaeunge honote yo bee nobaeinyeboke mo, Yesus na moisa orowate nolora ro bee ukeumi bere enetere,
Yesus yae weumi, “Bena yore ebe,” “Nebei yone ebalebene keledai hokolo fa mbai erenele ha yae rinainyekoke. Ro mbai na randa efileikoi mo. Na ha bulaerenekobe ndare yawenehobe mebe.
Ro hi miyae hi mare hinenayebena, ‘Rahere nebei keledai ha bulaereunge?’ Meyae wennele, ‘Maei Tuhan mae ukeume.’ ”
Hokolo bee ekete Yesus na are eleukoke huluinye bewate.
Nebei keledai hokolo fa na hane bulaerewoinye mo, keledaise hayeunge ro meke hineumi, “Rahere nebei keledai ha bulaereunge?”
Nebeibe hokolo bee yae weinye, “Maei Tuhan nda keledai randa efilengkondere hele.”
Nebeisa keledai yawoinyehoke Yesusle bokore ewate. Ekate na malo nebei keledai uwa ranne hayaeinyekoke nebeisa Yesusre ikilainyeboke keledai ranne yeunguweuboke.
Yesus keledai randa mei-meise mo mewole, ro miyae naei nibi ende ijende malo yae bewate.
Yerusalemde nobewounge, Zaitun moko nonore owole ijenne mo, naei ijoko yae erewate Allah naei mahi-mahi mokowole bewatene na moisa orowate yo helen sele mun sobolo Allahre buma kolowainye.
Nebei yo kaenate,
“Allahle ro yae meke Ondofolo,
onomi foka hubannele!”
Meyae ebeli bomanele surgane rei mai nekenayende
nane merau Allahre hili hebenainyende.
Farisi ro miyae nebei kaenate nolone hebate Yesusre wainye, “Guru, ndi Waei moisa mate yo weumi hilaibone.”
Nebeibe Yesus yae weumi, “Reyae wamale, ndi yo hilenaibondena, nda ruka ufemile kaenenate.”
Yesus Yerusalem yore nobewoungele wa euweke erewounge rimewounge,
elele, “Yei, Reyae kena kaban koimeyale mayae isaeyembombe Reyae na hului rei mai isembe, nebeibe nda hee nebei a usaei nunne hononende.
Ya mon mbai mende, wa yokeijo helen menate yo ele yanainyehonde na ranne honsi-honsire konate naeise kani hainyaikonde ahenayengkombe, yanenayengkombe, bohira bohira ainyayengkombe.
Allah waei hole moloiboise mekebe mayae Nare ehakoiboinye, waei ro miyae, waei kelu omi, waei imae obe, nemene ninae kuinyayengkombe, faeinyenayembombe, ruka ahunewate aene ranne ohonoi yembonde.”
Nebeisa Yesus Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyae eise eweufike nebeinye nai hei-sei yore hukewoumi weumi,
“Allahle homofaene nda wanen molaikoke, ‘Raei imae obe ro miyae ebeli boi-boi imaere yembonde.’ Nebeibe mayae mekaube yokoyo naei nalere maumokouboke!”
Allahle imaene mo rene huae keleumiyeke. Nebeibe imam yun-jun bele Musale walora wali heere foloukoke isaeyaeiboke kelaeimi yo bele Yahudi yun-jun bele Nare honaibondere nibi baewate.
Nebeibe nibi baewate an, rabuhine ban ro miyae helen Naei a faeu elewokene maeumikoke.

Ya mbai Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele imaehounge Allahle a foi faeu foinye Yesus huwoumi yae imam yun-jun bele Musale walora wali heere foloukoke homofaere isaeyaeiboke kelaeimi yo bele Yahudi yun-jun bele
mekate Yesusre hinainye, “Nde yae nda elae ikete?”
Nebeibe Yesus yae weumi, “Reyae benen mare hinerensimbere.
Yohanes ndele ro yae bure kowoumi, Allahle ro yae, ro miyae ro yae?”
Nebei ro na mo-mo arileufike elate, “Allahle ro yae elemakondena, Neyae aere wemmele, nebei wanenna rahene naei are elele huluinye mayae ehakoiboi?
Benen, ro miyae naeinya yae elemakondena, nda ro miyae boronate bae aere ruka yae hainyaimele, rabuhine ban naei u benera nekaimi Yohanes Allahle yendo kayaalo.”
Nebeinye Yesusre wainye, “Meyae maeisaei ban.”
Yesus yae weumi, “Reyae nane merau mare ewei, ndele elae yae nda rambun emere-emere mokale.”
Yesus nebei ro miyae arilewolere nda ahuba ahuneuboke huwoumi, “Kani rowa mbai anggur heke mokouboke. Nebeisa roi yae mokonate yore nebei heke kinyeumiboke, kulun uke, yo hire kolone oroweke.

Anire hokonate hee, nebei kani rowa naei yebaei bubaei mbaise ukeunge ewole naei ani kayeere rowende. Nebeibe nebei hekere mokate yo yae nare rahuae baikoke hukainyehike na me bangka u bangka yae ewole.
Nebei heke rowa benen yebaei bubaei hi ukeunge ewole. Nda kiyae mekere benen bowate fe mokainyeboke nebei hului mbai ukainyele na me bangka yae ewole.
Nebei heke rowa yebaei bubaei name nendo ukeunge eke. Nebei heke yo herawaikoke bowate ba hainyebokera, kaeibokate heke ele moinye wokate.
“Nebeisa bae nebei heke rowa yae elele, ‘Benen rahebe reyae mokorebondere. Mana raei kenare kanale fabe ufende endere. Neyae endene, ndi yo fe faenainyele era.’

“Nebeibe nebei heke rowa na kelu mewole erekainyelene nebei hekere mokate yo naeise naeise elate, ‘Naeko herendera nda hekere rowende kiyae niyae. Mem homabondere! Nda rambun rambun nukembonde aeise inyaibondere.’
Nebei fare yobaiboke ekate heke moinye haiboke.”
Nebeisa Yesus yae hineumi, “Nebei heke rowa bukensinde mende bae, nebei heke yore naendae yae mokommile?
Reyae elale meube nebei heke yore houkoube hele, nebeisa nebei hekere mo roweube benen hiwa yore yemmile.”
Yesus nebei a eleukoke boraikokene, nebei yo yae elate, “Meyae rabo halemale nebei wanen ebeijae!”
Yesus nebei ro miyaere ijoko ereumi mo wa elele, “Nebei wanen mae elaubena, nda Allahle homofaene honole a rahe naeise molaikoke?
‘Imae hei-seise isaei hebaen bele yo na hului banne wokate rukabe,
mana na bereise yae erainye?’
Ro miyae nde nebei ruka ranne ruwende kiyae mohi mohi kamai kamai yembonde; nde nebei ruka yae onde wende herawembondena, kani man kela mande yembonde.”

Musale walora wali heere foloukoke homofaere isaeyaeiboke kelaeimi yo bele imam yun-jun bele na hibi Nare ikilenaikonde nibi mbai baewainye rabuhine ban naeisaei Yesus naei u naeibe nebei ahuba ahuneuboke huweyole. Nebeibe ro miyae helen erewaimine fe yae faewate.

Nebei yo Yesusre naei ijoko ranne mo erainye. Ro mbembare a moi-moi yae mokaimikoke Yesusle bere ame-ame yae wali himalainyeboke yo yae enate. Yesusre melaeli roronainyele a mahi wanen elengkondena, nebei kanire ikileuboke Ondofolole me einye kinyenaibonde naeise.

Nebei ro a moi-moise mokaimikoke yo ekate Yesusre wainye, “Guru, meyae maeisaei nekande Waei a faeu kelaemae nemene na hele mo. Nane merau Allah a wete hului wali nibi naeise rore miyaere na bene-bene wamae, be ijokone erei.
Mana maere na yaka yae weime, Kaisarre pajak imanele, eyeijae?”
Yesus nebei yo naei holoka kate isaeyeubokene weumi,
“Nebei roi mbai Rare kelensebo. Ndele me nou bele ro yun bele honole?”
Nebei yo yae wainye, “Kaisarle.”
Yesus yae weumi, “Nebei wanenna, Kaisarle kayee Kaisarre yennele, Allahle kayee Allahre yennele!”
Nebei ro miyae nolone Yesus naei a faeu mbai sambai walangkare wainyejeke na hului ban yeuboke. Naei a eleukokene nebei yo fa yae bowate nane merau a ban faeu ban yaeiboke.
Saduki ro miyae (nda yo yae elate ro miyae heraiboke yo benen ewaleiboi) hiwa Yesusle bokore mekate. Yesusre hinainye,
“Guru, Musa nda a huwe a relen aere harawoume, ‘Ro mbai miyae rowende na fa ban mae herendena, nebei ro hereke naei aka baeke hele yae nebei miyaenale nekenete, naeka naei orona menare holensindere.’
Roko mbai ro mehine bee bele naeka nauwake nekewate. Na bena kiyae miyae rouke na fa ban mae nekeikoke neyae hereke.
Nauwake bee nendo nebei miyaenale rouke nane merau fa ban mae hereke.
Nebei wanen mae mo, oke nauwake na nime kalaikoinya kiyaele nekeikoke na fa ban mae hereke.
Nebei miyae nebei sului mbai na moisa na fa ban mae hereke.
Nebei ro yoni-yoni na mehine beene nemene nangkele nekaikokene, mende herewate yo benen anainyunde heene, nda miyae naei sele ndele nekenete?”
Yesus yae weumi, “Nda heena ro miyae yaronate, maengke rore enate.
Nebeibe bena ya fokehonolene, Allah yae wemmile anainyunde yo, benen rone miyaene kewa yumake mbainye ohonoi.
Allahle malaikat ekainyekate wanen, naei wanen enainyekende, here ehubayeikoi. Rabuhine ban heraibokera walenaibondene, nebeinye ndine Allahle kelu omire enayembonde.
Musa na yaka yae kelewoume, ro miyae herewate yo walenaibonde. Rabuhine ban isa folon i yae bewolene Musa yae Allahre nda ro yae kaenewounge, ‘Abrahambe Allah, Ishakle Allah, Yakuble Allah.’
Nebei aerene Neyae wali yo naei Allah ya, nulu mahe naei Allah ban. Allahle ro be ro yoinye ro miyae nemene wali bele nekate.”
Ro mbemba Musale walora wali heere foloukoke homofaere isaeyaeiboke kelaeimi yo yae wainye, “Waei a foi sele eleukokae.”
Benende hinenainyelere, nebei yo fe yae faewainye.
Yesus nebei yore hineumi, “Rahene ro miyae yae Wali Ondofolo, Ondofolo Daudle orona mena yae elate?
Daud nenaeijae homofae Mazmurne moloukoke,
‘Allah yae Raei Tuhande weunge,
Ra meube reufine meinyuweibo,
mende wa yokeijo nemene mokoremikonde
woro keleene menayorulembonde.’
“Daud yae Tuhan mae kaeneungena, naendae wanen benen Wali Ondofolore Daudle orona mena yae elemakonde?”
Nebei ro miyae Yesus ane elele borainye yae, Yesus weke na moisa orowate yore weumi,

“Kayaa hebembe ndi Musale walora wali heere foloukoke homofaere isaeyaeiboke kelaeimi yo. Nare rore melaeinyaimile naeise malo koko neme yae hireikoyate. Nai hei-sei anuwaunge ate bohire bohire eyorate. Ei mom-mom imaene anuwau foise nare baeyate, nebei sului mbai raman bulau nolone.

Miyae hi na molo herele bae, naei imae einya rambun-rambun belae walae yae yaroyate. Na bekore felenaikonde naeise, Allahre ebeli koko eibainye. Allah nebei yore ehee bukulu na ehekaei sele emmiwononde.”
Roko mbai Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyaene Yesus ijoko erewoumi yae run bele kangke bele nolone nekayeke yo na roi haufau anuwaunge hauwate.
Miyaenale rora moloufake mbai nane merau erewounge na wali kou kalo einye nekeyekebe meke na roi tembaga bee hele roi haufau anuwaunge haweukoke.
Nebeinye Yesus yae weumi, “Reyae wamale, nda miyaenale na helen selebe neyae hauwole.
Nebei run kangke nolone nekate yo ebibibe yaraikoke mekaisawate. Nebeibe nda miyaenale naei wali hunde nekewolebe rouke mewauboke.”

Na moisa orowate yo hiwa mekate Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyaena ruka baengko bele yae nane merau rambun hiwa yae uwa molainyebokene ei sele molowainye. Nebeibe Yesus yae nebei yore weumi,
“Na ya bele hembonde nda imae eraunge nemene fomene kerensonde onde, ruka mbai sambai aene ranne ohonoi.”
Nebei yo yae Yesusre hinainye, “Tuhan, Waei eleyae a makei ya yae yembonde? Iwau rahe ma yae rilende eremalene isaeimabonde nebei ya nobeungeboke?”

Yesus yae weumi, “Kayaa foi yae hebembe mare wabenayembe bele. Ro miyae helen sele Raei ro yae mekate are elenate. Nauwa naeise nda a elenate, ‘Reyae Wali Ondofolo Niyae! Huba mokoikoi ya nobeungeboke.’ Nebeibe, nebei yore oboroijae ehakoijae hele.
Buloo fela mahi-mahi naei aku borombena, buhae ohokoijae. Nebei nemene na bere yae menaibende, nebeibe huba mokoikoi ya na hibi yae ebei.”
Yesus benen huwoumi, “Yo yan hi anainyunde yo yan hi bele fela relenainyele, kani hina yo anainyunde kani hina yo bele relenainyele.
Oinyeu kaban makei-makei nemene hinende, moni mai, yano o reu ha reu nenaisande ungayonde, era buloo mennende. Iwau beko bako mahi-mahi eme hele yakura benate erembe.

“Nebeibe nda rambun-rambun nemene ebei mo, Raei aerene mare nemene ikilenayengkombera, weitasi konayembe. Ei mom-mom imaene yaungayembombe embe a kolonayembe nane merau kawa eise henayembe. Rare hakaufe aerene yobonayembe ondofolo kose bene yensebembe.
Nebei benatene, mayae Raei naei a faeu nebei yore huwemmile.
Mai kena elae yae hebembe, nebei hee naei a faeu hinenayembere mayae bukemmile naeise buhae ohokoijae.
Renaeijae isaei hebaen isembene, ma yokeijo yoni-yoni mai a faeu elembere ohoroiboi sului.
Ana yae arai yae, aka yae baeke yae, yoho yongko yae, hokolo uneyau wae, mai kelai nenayende. Hiwa yo mbemba mai nolora honaikonde.
“Rare hakonsele aerene, ro miyae nemene mare ikele konayembe.
Nebeibe, mai Allahlena wali henara neyae ehobeikoi sului.
Rare hila rabo halensemembe walora wali hena bona hubayengkombe.
“Felayo eremmile Yerusalem yo yanenainyekonde heene, mayae isaeyembombe nda yo na heki ban beko bendere.
Nebei hee Yudea kanina ro miyae mokore habelenate. Yerusalem yo einye nekaube yo nukembombe membalembe, yo moinya yo benen yo eise eijae.
Nebei ya Allah Na homofaene molaikoke honole huluinye ro miyae naei beko mokowate hului ehee bukulu hainyemikonde.
Nebei ya emale miyae holona nane merau wayeu miyae holona beko hele hubanainyele. Yudea kanina nekate yo beko hele hubanainyekonde nane merau ikele han kaban me u yoni-yoni hubanaimile.
Hiwa yo ramiyaeli yae honaikonde, hiwa yo ikilenate kani hi kela hire yaungaimile enate. Allahre onaeinye yo menate Yerusalem yo ei yae anainyebonde, mende Allah huluise raungehike ya membaensonde.
“Hune, okone, findelaunge, nebeinye yen mengkolonde. Nau wala kulun mendene, nda kanina kelana ro miyae fe yae waku yae yarommikonde, onenate handanate.
Nda kani kelane benatere fe kaban faenatene ro miyae hokoiko-hokoiko konate, rabuhine ban kunde waufe ikilaikoke honate nemene bulenaibonde alenaibondene.
Nebei hee ro miyae Reyae Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyaere elae wake bele one hengko hehe kaban bele mangko einye merele erenaisele.
Nebei wanen erembe benate heene, annumbe, be bumare wemembe, ebi fere mo wali hena bona rowelere.”
Nebeisa Yesus nda ahuba ahuneuboke huwoumi, “Ara no hebele bele o hiwa hebate bele eremmiko.
Reu bu kate eraube bae elaube yakama nobeungeboke.
Nebei sului mbai nda iwau hi hi erembe benate, mayae isaeyembombe ebi fere mo, Allah mare hole molonembombe.
“Reyae wamale, nda hokolo namman nekenate, nda a wamale nemene menaibende.
Buma a nemene nundenate, nebeibe Raei ako faeukobe niyae mbai sambai enundeiboi mo hononayende.

“Mauwa kayaa foi yae hele hebembe, yo koi yo bae naeise bele bu elae naeise bele nda wali naei kena beko mokoyeumi naeise bele aerene buhae hokonayembe belene, nane merau huba mokoikoi ya mende obo yoku wali omokoisainye walangkane ikilenaikonde beko hubanainyekonde wanen mare beko hubanayembe belene.
Nda kanina ro miyae nekande nemene nebei ya hubanaimikonde.

Kayaa foi yae hebembe. Allahre ebeli bonnele nebei beko bende yare mare hole molonembombe nane merau Reyae, Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uwa yeubokale Kiyae, benen merele heene mayae buhae ohokoi yae Raei bene hebembe.”
Na yane baei Yesus Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyaene eikeleumi. Huaere keisiyeunge Zaitun mokone einyekele.
Benen ya heiboyole bae, Allahre ei mom-mom imaene arilewainye ro miyae na rene mate Yesus are elende boronainyele naeise.
((Mesir kanine Allah yae Yahudi naei bena kelu fa-fare hole molouboke u bene nekeisi-nekeisi)) ya kaban Paskah nobewounge. (Nebei heene feu ragi ban anewate.)
Nebei yona ro miyae helende fe yae faewaimine, imam yun-jun bele Musale walora wali heere foloukoke homofaere isaeyaeiboke kelaeimi yo bele Yesusre honaibondere nibibe baewate.
Yesusle moisa orowate ro me bee oro nen bee bele nolona ro mbai Yudas Iskariotle kena einye walobo yun meweufike.
Nebeisa Yudas eke imam yun-jun bele Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyaele kayaare hebate yun-jun bele bokore eke Yesusre kelai nenendere are kolonainyekondere.
Nebei yo rei nekai kowate, Yudasre wainye, “Ware roi yae imayete.”
Yudas be hineuboke, ya monbe ereumeke Yesusre kelai nenende ro miyae naeisaei ban mae kinyemmibondere.
Nebei ya kaban ninae nobeungeboke. Nebei yare domba mbai hili era akau era yae Allahre ongkou feleiboyate.
Yesus Yohanesle Petruslere weumi, “Ebe ndire, nda ya kaban aei raman anemakondere mokonnehabe.”
Nebei bee hineinye, “Tuhan, makeinye Waei kena koyae meyae raman mokomansandere?”
Yesus yae weumi, “Yo eise ebebobe yae ro mbai na mene bu helena kaembonde mende. Hakonnekobe na moisa ebe, neyae enensinde imaene mangkele ebebobe.
Imae rorelere wennele, ‘Aei Tuhan mae riyele makei ijenne Rangkele Raei moisa orande yo bele nda ya kaban naei raman anemakonde?’
Nebei rorele imae buma raka na wakun kaban honolebe mare kelenebobe. Rambun-rambun na hului sului nebeinye honate. Nebeinye mayae raman mokonnehabe.”
Petrusle Yohanesle aloinyekoke ekete Yesus naei are eleukoke huluinye na ijenne bewate. Nebeinye hokolo bee Paskah raman mokoinyehake.
Paskah ramande anenate hee mo, Yesus meke Na abu ako nolora nuweuboke.
Nebei yore Yesus weumi, “Raei kena kaban kale Reyae namman beko ehubayeikoi yane, nda Paskah raman mbainye mangkele anemakonde.

Reyae wamale, nda heera benen reyae nda ya kabanda raman aneikoi mo nekerende, mende ro miyae Raei me kelee u keleene orulenaibonde nekenate yo Allah merau raungehike hului yae anenate. Benen nebei ro miyae Rangkele nanembainye anggur bu anemahinde.”
Nebeisa kolaei anggur bure rileuboke rouke, Naeko Allahre helen foise mo ukeunge wa elele, “Nda kolaei yaron, maise maeise menaei wahen.

Bene nekenayembe, nda heera benen Reyae nda ya kabanda raman aneikoi mo nekerende, mende Maeko mokommibonde ro miyae Raei me kelee u keleene orulenaibonde nekenate. Benen nebei ro miyae Rangkele nanembainye anggur bu anemahinde.”

Nebeisa, Yesus feu rouke benen Naeko Allahre helen foise ukeunge, benen Naei me yae kaiwole nebei yore iwoumi weumi, “Nda Raei uwa melen niyae, mai aerene ikembe. Rare u bene nekeisi-nekeisi wanende nda mokande wanen mae mokomembe.”

Nebei wanen mbai raman anaikoke mo, anggurre anate kolaeise mo rouke weumi, “Nda kolaei einye rambun ((walora u bene nekenayembe)) mai aerene Raei ha rileubokale. Raei ha yaere Allah a heteungekoke nibi neme ro miyaere wali himalainyeboke yo yae me baemmile a elaekei yeuboke.
“Nebeibe eraunge! Raei kelaise nenende kiyae Rangkele mbainye ndane nekende.
Reyae, Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyae, Allah meraufe raungehike huluinye hererele, nebeibe Raei kelaise nenende kiyae beko hele hubannende!”
Nebei yo naeise naeise na uware uware hinate, ndebe naei nolora nebei merau mokombonde?
Yesus na moisa orowate nolora aku yeuboke. Ro ndebe naei sele naei nolora rorele yae erenainyele (fe faenainyele).
Yesus yae weumi, “Nda kanina kelana nekeyate ondofolo kose na ro miyaere feleyaimi nane merau nauware kaenaimile, ‘Aka kayaa baeke kayaa yo.’
Nebeibe mayae nebei wanen omokoijae. Nde mai nolora rore ronainyele kiyae, na wali fa meha wanen mae oronde. Nde ondofolo kosere nekendena, bennehonde abu ako wanen mae mokonde.
Yebaei bubaei ramande wahaeimi yo ro ban. Ondofolo kose ramanne anele kiyaere ro rainyeboke. Nebeibe Reyae yebaei bubaei yae mai nolone nekeimeyale.
“Bekore meisubanale yane mayae Rangkele hebemeyande.

Raei yo waku einye mayae nendon Rangkele mbainye raman emanende naeise nane merau Israel naei akona akona me bee oro nen bee bele na orona mena yore naei walire mayae hului kolommile naeise, Maeko yo waku mbai kinyewoufe naei wanen mbai Reyae mare yo waku mbai kinyerembe.”

Raei yo waku einye mayae nendon Rangkele mbainye raman emanende naeise nane merau Israel naei akona akona me bee oro nen bee bele na orona mena yore naei walire mayae hului kolommile naeise, Maeko yo waku mbai kinyewoufe naei wanen mbai Reyae mare yo waku mbai kinyerembe.”
Yesus na moisa orowate ro mbai na ro Simon. Yesus yae weunge, “Simon, Simon, boroyae! Walobo yun meke riyeufehike ware wabeneifitere.
Nebeibe Simon, Reyae waei naei ebeli Allahre bowanale hila rabobe nelae yae mo hebele. Weyae benen bukeufinde Raei a ufete hului nekele ya, waei aka baeke hiwa yo naei hila rabore elae eumiyende.”
Petrus yae weunge, “Tuhan, ware kawane henayeikotena, honayeibotena, raei uwa mokoungehakale Wangkele mbainye nekale.”
Nebeibe Yesus yae weunge, “Petrus, mana ya ojo mukuu a namman okoikoi mo, Rare weyae waeisaei ban mae roko name weumikonde.”
Nebeisa Yesus yae nebei yore weumi, “Na bena hele mare ukamale embe naeise. Malo huba, kakali, oro mehau nemene eyaroi eijae ukamale. Nebei hee kalo molowombe?”
Nebei yo yae wainye, “Omoloiboi!”
Yesus yae weumi, “Nebeibe nda heera, malo huba, kakali hononatena, nemene yarongkombe embe; nde ramiyaeli banna u hale yae na malo roi naise hembonde, nebei roi yae na hibi ramiyaeli rowende.
Allahle homofaene Raei naeise nda a molaikoke, ‘Nare u hila wa hila ro yae elenaikonde.’
Nebei a Raei uwane yembonde hele. Allahle homofaene Raei uwa naeibe molowate hului na hele benate eraube.”
Yesus na moisa orowate yo yae wainye, “Tuhan, ereibo ndana ramiyaeli bee.”
Yesus yae weumi, “Ninae na hului.”
Yesus benen naei orole wanen Yerusalem nukeungeboke na moisa orowate yo bele Zaitun mokore iwate.
Ikate mo weumi, “Ebeli Allahre bonnele, walobo yun wabenensimbe balembe bele.”
Nebeisa Yesus ruka yalo roko mbainya wande eukuweube hului yae nebei yo naei bokora nahau eke, oro selen-selen mae oukoroukoke Naekore ebeli bowounge,
“Arai, na huluinya, nda beko Raei rande mendere ahaufe yae kinyeibo eu. Nebeibe Raei kena kale yae omokoijae, Waei kena huluinye mo mokole.”
Surgana malaikat mbai meujakauboke elae ikeunge.
Yesus na kena u eisa han wanen mae howote nebeinye benen Naekore ebeli bowounge. Na uwana roibu ha kibo-kibo wanen mae kani rande balewate.
Ebelira boungekokera mo, Yesus benen na moisa orowate yo riyare eke. Nebei yo eke erewoumi kena beko kaban kowatene nemene u kei-keinye ijongkune mo honaiboke.
Nebei yore weumi, “Rahene ijongkune mo honaube? Annu, ebelibe bonne walobo yun mare wabenensimbe balembe bele.”
Yesus namman nare ane elate bae, ro homo mbai nekate mewole. Yudas Yesusle moisa orowate kiyae yae be neuboke eke Yesusre yoi bulure hunennehindere.
Nebeinye Yesus yae Yudasre weunge, “Yudas, wa kelai neufende naeise Rare yoi bulu yae huneufehindere?”
Yesus na moisa orowate yo nda rabuhi yembonde era erewaimine Yesusre wainye, “Ramiyaeli yae folomakondere ya.”
Nebeisa Yesus na moisa orowate ro hi ramiyaeli yae uke bae, imam kaban nabu ako na angkaei meube reufibe neufake ruke.
Nebeibe Yesus yae weunge, “Ninae okoijae!” Nebeisa nebei ro nangkaeise mo ikileungeboke na hibi foi yeuboke.

Nebeisa Yesus imam yun-jun bele Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyae kayaare hebate yo bele uwoumi, “Rare yokolo yae elaubene era, Raei ikileiboise ramiyaeli yae o bohi-bohi yae yaraukoke mekaube?

Reyae na yane baei Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyae na imaehounge nuweuboyale keleimeyamaelebe, mayae Rare ikileiboi. Nebeibe ninae, nda ya mayae ouben hauben nolone nekaube yo mai kena hului mokongkombe.”
Yesusre ikilaiboke, na hibi hele yawainyehoke imam kabanbe imaene ewate. Yesusre yawainyehoke ewate moisa Petrus na ahau folo yae hakoumiboke.
Nebeinya ro miyae uware akelenate naeise imaehou nolone i ralo kaban mokaibokene nuwaikoke. Petrus na nolone eunguweuboke.

Petrus nebei imaehounge namman nekele yae, maengke mbai imam kabanbe yebaei bubaei nebei nolora meke Petrus isehe naeungekoke yae ereungekoke nabe ijoko roungeboke wa weunge, “Nda ro Yesus Nangkele mbainye orowote.”
Nebeibe Petrus oneunge yae elewole, weunge, “Reyae Nare onaenale.”
Na heki ban mo ro hi Petrusre erewounge, weunge, “Weyae nane merau Naei holo mbainye orowaube.”
Petrus weunge, “Reyae nebei holona ban!”
Hukai mbai nekeukoke mo, ro hi eleukoke, “Na yaka hele weyae nebei holona na ro hi niyae, rabuhine ban weyae Galilea kanina rone.”
Petrus weunge, “Waei a eleyae reyae na hele isian!” Petrus nda a mekai eleukoke hee yae ojo a koukoke.
Tuhan Yesus be beufoke Petrusre na hibi ijoko ereungeboke. Petrus nebei hee yae Yesus yae ukeunge abe u bene nekeungehike, “Nda hee ojo a okoikoi mo, weyae roko name Rare oneufekonde a eleukonde.”
Petrus nebei abe u bene nekeungehikene, imaehou moise eke rime a yan bu yan rimewole.
Yesusle kayaare hebate yo hiwa Nare aukaka kowainye hiwa rahuae yae bowate.
Nane kayaa yo hebate yae na ijoko aheikoyainye mo hinainye, “Mana eleiko nde yae ware rahuae ukete.”
Nane merau aukaka konainyele a nekai sele uwainye.
Ya heuboke mo, Yahudi yun-jun bele imam yun-jun bele Musale walora wali heere foloukoke are isaeyaeiboke kelaeimi yo arileufike, Yesus yawainyehoke naei are kolainye ijenne meufebeunguke.
Nebei yo wainye, “Maere yakaimebo, Wali Ondofolo Kiyae Weyae Niyae?”
Yesus yae weumi, “Mare yakarembombena, mai nolora ro mbai sambai a hele yae eleikoi.
Nane merau Reyae mare hinerensimbena, mayae wo okoi.
Nebeibe nda heera Reyae, Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyae, ninae erele Allah Elaelo Wakelo Naei meube reufine erenuwembondere.”
Borate yo nemene hinainye, “Naendae wanen, Weyae na hele Allahle Kelu?”
Yesus yae weumi, “Mayae elaube hului mbai.”
Nebei yo yae elate, “Ro miyae Naeinya a hele ame lon ninae oboroijae, mana ya naei euwara na hele borokande!”
Nebei are kolainye yo nemene ainyukate, Yesusre yawainyehoke Ondofolo Pilatusle bere ekate.

Nebeinye ekate mo, nebei yo Nare nda a horoubokebe elate, “Nda ro erannekoke aei kanina ro miyaere nibi bekobe keleimeyeumi. Neyae weumi Kaisarre pajak omokonnemae. Nauware elele Neyae Ondofolo hi yae, Wali Ondofolo yae.”
Nebeinye Pilatus Yesusre hineunge, “Na hele Weyae Yahudi naei Ondofolo?”
Yesus yae weunge, “Wenaeijae nane merau eleyae.”

Nebeinye Pilatus imam yun-junde, nebei ro miyae arilewolere weumi, “Reyae nda ro naei u mekai wa mekai nane merau naei a faeu nemene ereungekokale, na foi bangka mo. Rahe randa Nare bekore mokomandere?”

Benen nebei yo waeli hele baete elate, “Yudea kanina ro miyae nemene a moi hurewoumile naei era hena hului ehakoiboi yae nekenate, na bereise Galilea kanina ro miyaere bere a nareumikoke, mana meke ndane.”
Pilatus nebei elaikoke are boroukokene hineumi, “Nda Galileana ro?”

Galilea kanina yo Ondofolo Herodesle me einye honole. Pilatus isaeyeuboke Yesus Galileana rone, nebeinye Yesus ukainyele Ondofolo Herodesle bokore eke. Herodes nebei hee Yerusalem yore kolone oroweke.

Ondofolo Herodes Yesusle a elayeke borowekene, kena kaban kowole na be ijoko erenembondere. Herodes rabo halewole Yesus rambun emere-emere naei bene mokombonde. Neyae Yesusre erewoungene naei uwa roweungehike.
Nebeinye Herodes Yesusre a hi yae hineyeunge hi yae hineyeunge, nebeibe Yesus a mbai sambai ewei sele.
Imam yun-jun bele Musale walora wali heere foloukoke homofaere isaeyaeiboke kelaeimi yo bele hebewate Yesusre a elaekei sele nekainyele.
Herodes bele naei felayo bele Yesusre mahi-mahi mokowainye, aukaka yae kowainye, ondofolo ondofolo naei yo malo yan malo haeinyeboke, benen bukainyehike Pilatusle bokore ekate.
Herodes bele Pilatus bele yokeijo yae nekeyekebe, nebeibe nebei ya foi mokoikokete kahilire yeibokete.
Pilatus imam yun-jun bele Yahudi yun-jun hiwa bele ro miyae hosoro bele arilewoumi
weumi, “Mayae nda ro raei bokore yawaungehoke meke elaube ro miyaere a nekai huweumi akure ketembondere. Mana ya nda mai bene reyae ereungekokale, mainya beko elaube naeinye reyae ehubayeikoi mo.

Herodes nebei sului mbai ehubaikoi, rabuhine ban ereungekokera ukeumi benen raei bokore yawainyehoke mekate. Nda ro Na me u mokolera nane merau Naei a faeu elerera erannekoke. Mayae nane merau na yaka eraube hoiboise homabondere me ure Neyae omokoiboi.
Nebeinye reyae rahuaere mo ufemile bonaikondera haisengkonde ende.”
Paskah ya kabande mo naei era hena huluinye, kawane hebate ro mbai nebei yore Pilatus hayennekonde menduwende.
Nebei ro miyae arilewole yo yae kaenate, “Nebei ro hombo! Maere Barabasbe hayennoko meukuwe!”
(Barabas yo kelai yan kelai mokouboke, ro houkokene kawane haeinyekoke.)
Pilatus kena kowole Yesusre hayennekonderene, nebei ro miyae arilewolere a roko hi bele a uwoumi.
Nebeibe nebei yo yae kaenate, “Nare ohaline bongko! Nare ohaline bongko!”

Roko name nendo Pilatus nebei hului mbai hineumihike weumi, “Rahe bekobe neyae mokouboke? Reyae mbai sambai Naeinye beko ehubayeikoi, Nare homabonde aere u hele. Nebeinye reyae ufemile Nare rahuae bonaikonde, nebeisa haisengkonde ende.”
Nebeibe nebei yo kali ara nene kaenate Yesus ohaline bonaikondere hele. Naei a yae mo herawaiboke.
Nebeinye Pilatus nebei yo Yesus herendere a kaenewatene ninae be hineumiboke.
Nebei Barabas kawane hebele kiyae, yo kelai yan kelaise neungeboke kiyae riyainye huluinye Pilatus hayeungekoke meukuke. Pilatus Yesusre nebei yo naei me einye ikeumi naei kena hului yae mokowainye.
Nebei yo yae Yesus yawainyehoke nibi nolone Simon Kirenena ro yo eise menensindere mewole. Simonde ikilaiboke a elae haeinyekoke ukainyele Yesus ohali kaewekebe kaembonde.
Ro miyae nekai sele Yesus na moisa hakainyekoke keteijeke. Miyae maengke nane merau hakainyekoke. Naei nolora hiwa Yesusre rime rimainyejeke.
Nebeibe Yesus euweke nebei yore weumi, “Yerusalem miyae maengke! Rare rimensemae. Mauwa, mai kelu omi rimebe rimemmi.
Naei yo bei yan bei ya mendene wa, mayae elembe, ‘Foi sele moi sele miyae kihore nekeyate yo, naei kou yahira kelu omi mbai ohonoi mo. Nane merau naei nime bune fa hi enareiboi mo.’
Nebei hee yae
Ro miyae elure yoise ungaimile,
‘Kereiso maere oimeherawe!’
nane merau elure yoise ungaimile,
‘maere feleimekone!’ ”

Reyae o nehi wanen, rabuhine ban Reyae beko ban bako banne, mayae niyae o kala-kala wanen, beko bako nekai mokoyaubene. Reyae o nehi wanen Kiyaere beko mokaisene, emekai wanen mare o kala-kala wanen yore beko mokonayengkombe.
Buloo kelai fela kelai ro bee nane merau yawaimiboke Yesus nanembainye ohali bonaikondere.
Ikate Ro Yun Bo Ma anuwau wae wainye ijenne Yesus ohaline baikoke. Nebei ro bee na meline meubene baikoke.
Yesus weumi, “Arai, ndi ro miyae naei beko mokate faeinyeumibonde, rabuhine ban naei me u mokate neyae isaeyeiboi sului.”
Yesus nambelae nebei felayo yae oye nihaeiboke nenaeijae mo wahaeikoke.

Nebeinye hebewate yo ijoko isane erewate. Yahudi yun-jun Yesusre aukaka kowainye, wainye, “Ro miyae hiware hole moloumiyekae lonbe, nda hee Allah yae na hele eleuboke ukete nda kani kelare Wali Ondofolore mekaena, Waei uware wenaei hole moloibo!”
Kayaare hebate felayo nebei hului mbai aukaka kainye. Anggur bu faere mobe ikainyele.
Wainye, “Na hele Weyae Yahudi naei Ondofolona, Wauwa hole moloibo!”
Na yun ran bumare bohire yae homo nda a yae molaikoke,
Nebei ro bee meline meubene hebete hi yae Yesusre nane aukaka bae kounge, “Na hele Weyae Wali Ondofolona, mana nda hebandera wali yeimeko!”
Nebeibe na hi kayee yae weunge, “Weyae Allahre fe efaei? Nda ehee bukulu na hului mbai relannele.
Nebeibe meyae bee maei me u mokondekoke huluinye yarondekoke, nebeibe nda ro u mekai beko omokoyei.”
Nebeisa Yesusre weunge, “Yesus, Waei yo waku Wenaei mele neubonde heene, raei u bene bele nekenayete.”
Nebeibe Yesus yae weunge, “Reyae na hele wawale, nda heene wangkele Rangkele wali yo hena yo einye ayembonde.”
Nebei hee hu yaukanne hului, nebeibe ouben hauben yeuboke hebewoke oke huae rai hujoko namene.
Hu na nukui u yeuboke, Allahle imaene malo kaban heere folaikoke uke fo beere raweukoke.
Yesus kali na kaban don mae kaenele, “Arai! Raei unulu Waei me einye kinyawale!” Nebei are mo eleukoke bae, na no na hibi hokoukoke.
Felayo na yun kiyae, nenaei ijoko yae erewole, Allahre buma kolowounge, “Na hele! Nda ro na hele wali himaloungeboke.”
Isare erenatere hokoweke ro miyae bewate naeise ijoko yae erewatene, imaere obere ewate na kena eisa mehi yae ekaifolowate.
Yesus na kahili wafeu bele miyae maengke Galileara hakainyekoke mewate yo bele na felanda mo hebaiboke erainyoke.
Ro mbai na ro Yusuf Yudea kanina Arimatea yone honole. Naei wali himaloungeboke, na foi sele nekeweke. Nebei hee neyae Yahudi yoyo koseyo holona ro mbai.
Neyae nane merau Allah Naei yo waku mennembondere rakeungeke. Yahudi naei yoyo koseyo hebewolebe, nebeibe Yesusre honaibonde a ruke neyae be ehineiboi.
Yusuf eke Pilatusre riyeungehike Yesus na nore roungatere.

Nebeinye Yesus na nore ohali randa rubainyeboke roukate. Malo naei foi sele mokaiboke na ro lenan nebei here no rulaisike. Ruka buleinye ekate nekainyele. Nda ruka bulei manemfa hele waeibokate. Hi yae ha yae nebei anuwaunge here no mbai eneyei.
Nebei ya maehae mbai nen, Sabat ya nobeungeboke.
Nebei miyae maengke Galilea kanira Yesus nangkele mbainye mewate yo Yusufre hakainyekoke nebei bulei bele Yesus naendae yae ruka buleinye nekainyele belere eraikoke.
Bukaiboke imaere ekate, Yesusle uwa rilenaibonde naeise bu fololo bele mokainyehake. Musale walora wali heere foloukoke a huluinye neyae Sabat yane no yaeiboke.
Minggu ya na rene kaukau fele nebei miyae maengke naei rambun-rambun mokainyehake bele yaraikoke ruka buleise ewate.
Ruka buleise ekate nebei ruka kaban bulei romaufe ahaeikoke erewate olaeinyekoke.
Na hibi eise ayeuboke bae, Yesus na no erewate an.
Nebeinye hebaiboke onei-onei onewate mo, ro bee nambelae wili yae bate na bokone meisebeuboke.
Nebei miyae maengke fe hele yaroumikokene na be kanire bekate. Hebate wa, nda ro bee nebei yore a weimi, “Rahene mayae wali bele nekele ro herewate yo nolore yae baeyaunge?
Neyae oloo! Neyae ninae aunguke! Galilea kanine nekeweke hee nda a mare uwombe u bene nekenayembe,
‘Reyae wamale, Reyae, Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyaere beko bakore mokoyate yo naei me einye kinyenaisebonde, ohaline bonaisekonde, nebeisa ya name mo arenunde.’ ”
Nebei miyae maengke Yesus nebei a ukeumire u bene nekaimihike.

Nebei miyae maengke ruka buleisa baeibokate mekate mo, Yesus na moisa orowate yo ro me bee oro nen mbai bele yore ruka buleinye bewate rambun nemene huwewaimi nane merau na moisa orowate yo hiware bele huwaimi.
Nebei are huwaimi miyae maengke nda na ro niyae: Maria Magdalena, Yohana, Maria Yakobus nenake kiyae, nane merau miyae maengke hiwa yo Yesus na moisa orowate yo bele.
Na moisa orowate yo yae nebei miyae maengke a huwoumire na hele ban elewate. Naei waimi are a bulaen-bulaen mae elate.

Nebeibe Petrus hakauboke ruka buleise ewole. Eke, are niheufike, nebei bulei eise erewole, Yesus Nauware rulaisike malo mo nebeinye honowole. Petrus bukeufike ewole na kena eisa hubaunge an nda wanen yeubokere.
Nebei ya mbai Yesus na moisa orowate ro bee Emaus yore ewote. Yerusalem yora Emaus yore nahau 10 km hului.
Nda Yerusalemne rilewole iwaube hokolo bee na oro ranne mete huweimeyete.
Eleimeyete, huweimeyete na u benera koloimeyeinyele mo, Yesus meke hokolo beere meumibarauboke nanembaisa mewate.
Erabuhi yae mokoiboyaimi wanen, Yesusre erewoinyebe, nebeibe Nare ro oroiboi.
Yesus yae hineumi, “Rahe ahubabe nda nibi nolone mayae bee huweimeyeube?”
Hokolo bee hebeiboke na be bele kabeikoke.
Hokolo bee metera ro hi kiyae na ro Kleopas beufoke Yesusre weunge, “Wembai kolo ro era, nda Yerusalem yo einye manemfana bewate rambunde isaeyeiboi?”
Yesus yae hineumi, “Rahe rambun?”

Hokolo bee yae weinye, “Nebei Nasaret yona ro Yesus. Neyae Allahle yendo kayaalo mbai. Naei a faeu bele Naei me u bele walora Allah na hele ukeunge meke naeise yakaungeboke nane merau ro miyae isaeyaeiboke Neyae Allahlera.
Imam yun-jun bele maei Yahudi yun-jun mae Nare honaibonde naeise Ondofolo Pilatusle me einye kinyainyeboke. Felayo yae Nare ohaline baikokate!
Maei rabo halewande hului Neyae mende maei Israel yoni-yoni Romawi naei me kelee u keleera bulaeremmele. Nebei ya yeubokera meke ya namebe yeuboke.
Nane merau miyae maengke hiwa maei nolora mekate maere mokaimeboke kulu-kulu hele yaendeboke. Na rene kaukau fele ruka buleise ekate,
nebeibe Yesus Na here no ehubayeikoi. Mekate elate, ‘Meyae ekande, malaikat mo erekammile. Nebei malaikat yae waime Yesus waleuboke.’
Maeisa hiwa yo nane merau ruka buleise ekate, mekate elate miyae maengke a na helebe elate. Meyae mbaibe ekande, Yesusre ereiboi.”
Nebeinye Yesus yae nebei beere weumi, “Mayae na kobu hele! Allahle yenjo kayaayo homone molaikoke are mayae na hele elengkombere kena wauwau kaube.
Wali Ondofolo Allah are kolowounge hului beko helen hubannekonde helera Allah yae one hengko yae kitenengkonde.”
Nebeisa Naei uwa naei abe Allahle homofaene nemene molowate yakawoumi, Musale homofaera huba raweuboke meke Allahle yenjo kayaayo molaikoke homofae nemene.
Emaus yo nobewainye yae, Yesus na hibi endere uwa haraungeboke.
Nebeibe hokolo bee heraweinyeboke weinye, “Be bahele ya na heki ban mo ouben yembondere, ninae lon maengkele ndane honoma.” Nebeinye Yesus eweufike nebeinye hononatere.
Nanembainye nuwaikoke ramande anenatere yae, feu rouke, Naekore helen foise mo ukeunge, na hibi kayeukoke hokolo beere waheumiboke.
Nebei heera hokolo bee na ijoko keleumikoke, Yesusre ro roinyeboke. Nebeibe Yesus hokolo bee naei nolora nundeuboke.
Naeise naeise hi yae hire weunge, “Ra kena roweufehike hele, Allahle homofaene a honate yakaimeyeumene!”
Na hibi hokolo bee ainyukete bukeiboke Yerusalem yore ewote. Nebeinye na moisa orowate ro me bee oro nen mbai bele ro miyae hiwa yo bele arileufike nekewate.
Nebeinye nekate yo yae hokolo beere waimi, “Tuhan nana hesele waleuboke! Simonde Na uwa yakaungeboke.”
Nebeisa hokolo bee nibine ekete hubayaeikoke a huwoimi nane merau Yesus feunge kaiwole heene ro roinyeboke.
Nebei bewate ahubane nare huwate mo, Yesus meke na nolone yakaiboi yae yakauboke weumi, “Onomi foka hubanne!”
Nebei yo enaelo yae elewatene fe yae waku yae yaroumikoke.
Nebeibe Yesus yae weumi, “Rahene fe faeube, rahene mai hila rabo elae ban yaeiboke?
Raei me bele oro bele ijoko eren. Nda Reyae hele ya! Me foi yae Raei uwa ramense ijoko foi yae erense, enaelo naei melen bo Raeinya eraufele wanen ban.”
A huwoumira na me bele oro bele na hibi kelewoumi erewate.
Rei nekai kowatebe, nebeibe ijoko kelei-kelei mo kelewatene namman Neyae na hele waleuboke a eleikoi. Yesus yae hineumi, “Mai nolona raman ban mo mekaube?”
Ka bohi inye beubokere mo roukate ikainyele.
Yesus nebei ka ikainyelere mo, nebei yo naei bene hebeunguke anewole.

Yesus weumi, “Rangkele mbainye orowande heene nda abe uwamale, Musale homofae moloukoke bele Allahle yenjo kayaayo hiwa molaikoke bele Mazmurne moloukoke bele nebei a nemene hului Raei naei molowate na hele benate bangka mo.”
Nebeisa Yesus elae ikeumi Allahle homofaene a na mekai harainyebokere na hului isaeinyaibonde.
Yesus yae weumi, “Allahle homofaene molaikoke hului Wali Ondofolo mende, beko hubanengkonde, herendera ya name mo walembonde.

Nda kani kela nemene forilengkonde Yerusalem yora bere huba raungaibonde nda a Wali Ondofolole Ro randa hungaimile, ‘Ro miyae nde na beko bakora nulu kennebondena, Allah naei beko bakora faeinyemmibonde.’
Mayae nemene mai ijoko yae erewaube rambun mai angkaei yae borowaube rambun yoni-yoni huwemembe.
Allah are heteungekoke huluinye Reyae mare Naeinya Roh isembere. Nebeibe mayae nda yone namman nekembe mende Allah Naei elae wake bele ketenembombe.”
Yesus yaweumiboke nebei yo eisa maibaleke ekate Betania yone, Na mere mo raneuweke nebei yore onomi yae ei hawewoumi.
Namman nare onomi ei hawewoumi yae, na hibi kaeuboke surgare ewole.
Nebei yo Nare ei molowainye, nebeisa uwa roweumihike yae Yerusalemde bukaiboke ewate.
Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyaene nekayeke, na hibi-hibi Allahre buma kolainyeke.
John: Nda homofae Yesus Wali Ondofolole naeise. Neyae nda kani kela beme fome hele Allahle nanembainye nekewote. Neyae Allah Naei uwa mbai nane merau Allah Naei a elele Kiyae yae kaenainye.
Na beme fome hele rambun yoni-yoni hengkelen erasi hee Neyae Allahle nanembainye nekewote.
Allah yae ukeunge huluinye Yesus Wali Ondofolo Nembai yae rambun nanemene mokoukoke, elae hi rambun mbai sambaise omokoiboi sele.

Wali Ondofolole einya nekele nebei wali no niyae. Hehe ouben haubenne naeumile yae ro miyae na foi mokonatere erenaimile. Nebei sului mbai Wali Ondofolo wali nibi kelewoumi yae ro miyae wali foi nekenatere isaeiwaimi.

Allahre onaeinye ro miyae ouben hauben nolone wanen orate. Hehe ouben haubende naeumile wanen mae ro miyae nolone Wali Ondofolo Naei wali nibi a kelewoumi. Nebei are walobo yoni-yoni hun eraisi sului.
Allah yae ro mbai ukeunge meke, na ro Yohanes.

Neyae burelende bonde robe meke. Ro miyae nemene Wali Ondofolore hila rabo halenate naeise Yohanes yae nda a huwoumi, “Wali Ondofolo mende, hehere naemmile Kiyaere yembonde, rabuhine ban Naei wali nibi a kelemmile.”
Yohanes bae nebei hehere naemmilere Kiyae ban, nebeibe Naei a moi neisi kiyaere yeuboke.
Yesus hehere naemmilere kaenewainye Kiyae. Neyae hehe naeumile wanen Naei wali nibire ro miyae nemene kelemmilere.
Nebei hehere naemmilere kaenewainye Kiyae nda kani kelane nekewole yae nda kani kela Neyae mokouboke hororebe, Neyae meke hee nda kani kelana ro miyae Nare onewainye.
Naei ro miyae bokore mekebe, nebeibe Naei ro miyae yae Nare ei aiboi.
Nebeibe ro miyae nanemene eise hauwainyele yo, Naei Rore hila rabo halewainyele yo, Allahle kelu omire inyaibondere nibi mokouboke.
Nebei ro miyae melen u ha u yae ohonoi nane merau ro bele miyae bele kena huluinye ban, naei sele naei kena u Allahlera honoukoke.

Yesus, Allah Naei a elele Kiyae, ro miyae uware yeuboke, aei u nolo u kainye nekewole. Ako bele Kelu nene waewae eyae ijokore eranneboke Kiyae. Naei Ako Allahle bokora meke, ro miyaere kena buhae u buhae aere ban mae heumi, Naei na hele wali nibire keleumi.

Yohanes yae Yesusle abe ro miyae helende a kaban mae isaeiwoumi wa kaenewoumi, “Nda Kiyae naeise na bere nda a haraungebokale uwamale, ‘Raei moisa mende Kiyae, nda Niyae. Neyae ro bele enainyeronde, reyaebe ro ban. Rabuhine ban rare nda kani kelane ohonoi mo, nebei Kiyae bere meke nekewole.’ ”
Neyae ro miyaere kena buhae u buhae aere ban mae heumene, no ban hee ban aere foi mokoume.

Allah yae Naei yendo kayaalo Musale walora wali heere foloukoke abe ikeume. Nebeibe Allah yae Yesus Wali Ondofolole walora aere kena buhae aere ban mae heume nane merau Naei na hele wali nibire keleume.
Ro miyae hi yae ha yae Allahre roko mbai ereiboi mo. Nebeibe Allahle Kelu mbai Naekole u mekai mbainye ekeinyekete Kiyae yae Allahlena abe aere yakaumeboke.

Naei uwa naei are hinenainyehindere, Yerusalemna Yahudi ro miyae yae imam yoni-yoni bele Lewi yohona orona mena yo hiwa bele ukaimile Yohanesle bokore enatere. Neyae Yohanesre wainye, “Weyae naeinya hesele nde?”
Nebei mekai hinainyehikene Yohanes na yaka lon mae weumi, “Reyae Wali Ondofolo ban ma.”
Neyae benen hinainye, “Nebei wanenna, weyae nde? Allahle yendo kayaalo Elia era?”
Nebeibe Yohanes yae weumi, “Niyae ban.”
Nebei yo yae benende hinainye, “Weyae Allahle yendo kayaalo kaban mendere meyae rakanne kiyae era?”
Nebeibe Yohanes yae weumi, “Niyae ban.”
Nebei yo yae wainye, “Weyae naeinya hesele nde? Ukaimele yore bemabonde emamiwenderene, waei uwa naeise nde yae emalengkonde?”
Yohanes nauwa naeise Allahle yendo kayaalo Yesaya homone moloukoke a hului yae weumi, “Ro mbai a kala-kalara burelen eke bole, ‘Tuhanbe nibi hiyei ranembo!’ ” Reyae nebei kiyaere yeubokale.
Ukaimi ekate yo nolona hiwa Farisi holona yo.
Nebei yo yae Yohanesre hinainye, “Weyae Wali Ondofolo ban, Allahle yendo kayaalo Elia ban, nane merau Allahle yendo kayaalo meyae rakanne kiyae ban donbe, ndele ro yae weyae bu kamae?”
Yohanes yae weumi, “Reyae bu yae kamaele. Mai nolone ro mbai hebele, mayae Nare onaeunge.
Nebei Kiyae Niyae raei moisa mende. Naei oro mehau ha niheisi kulaiboise reyae na hului ban. Nare ro rowainye, nebeinye Naei bene reyae ro ban sele.”
Nebei me u mokowole nemene Betania yo honole Yordan wi enaa reufi Yohanes bure kowoumi anuwaunge bewate.
Ya heuboke mo, Yohanes erele Yesus naei bokore mele. Nebeinye hebate yore Yohanes yae weumi, “Erenne, ndi Kiyae Niyae Allahle Domba Kelu.
Nda kani kelana ro miyae naei beko bakore faeinyeiboi naeise nda Kiyae mele naei wali yae kinyembondere.

Reyae nebei Kiyaele abe na bere nda wanen mae haraungebokale isaeiwamale, ‘Raei moisa mende Kiyae nda Niyae. Neyae ro bele ronainyele, nebeibe reyaebe ro ban. Rabuhine ban reyae nda kani kelane ohonoi mo, nebei Kiyae meke nekewole.’
Reyae nane merau na bere oneungekokale nebei Kiyae nde. Nebeibe Neyae Israel ro miyae nolone uware yakammibonde naeise reyae bere holo bu yae koremilere mekale.”
Yohanes Yesusle naeise nda wanen mae a isaeiwoumi weumi, “Reyae ereubokale Allahle Roh aye merpati wanen mae yakura oke, Naei uwa ranne oufebeunguke hebele.

Reyae isaeyeiboi nebei Kiyae nde. Nebeibe rare bu yae koremilere ukeufe Kiyae nda wanen mae ukeufe, ‘Weyae erele Allahle Roh onde ro mbai uwa ranne onsebenunde Kiyae, nebei Ro weyae bure kamae wanen mae ro miyaere Allahle Roh yae kommile.’ ”
Yohanes yae eleukoke, “Nebei Role uwa ranne yeuboke iwau raei ijoko yae erewalene nda a yae isaeyaemale, nebei Kiyae Allahle Kelu Niyae.”
Ya heuboke mo, Yohanes nebei anuwau mbainye na moisa orowate ro bee bele hebewate.
Erewounge, Yesus na bera mewole mo, weumi, “Erenne, ndi Niyae Allah Naei Domba Kelu Kiyae!”
Yohanes na moisa orowote ro bee nebei wanen a boroketene, na hibi Yesusle moisa hakoinyekoke.
Yesus ereumi hokolo bee na moisa hakoinyekoke metene, euweke mo hineumi, “Mayae rahebe baeimeyeube?”
Hokolo bee yae weinye, “Rabi (na mekai, Guru), Weyae makeinye nekeyae?”
Yesus yae weumi, “Mebu, menaeijae meberebo.”
Hokolo bee Yesusre hakoinyekoke nekewole anuwaufe ekate, nebei ya koko nanembainye nekayoke. Huae rai hukai keli hului yeuboke.
Yohanes eleukoke are boroibokene Yesusre na moisa hakoinyekoke hi na ro Andreas, Simon Petrus naka baeke.

Andreas na hibi naka baeke Simonde nda are wennelere baeungekoke, hubayeikokete mo weunge, “Aka baeke, meyae Wali Ondofolobe hubayaendekoke, Allah yae oro umaufe heraweungeboke Kiyae!” (Na ro Ibrani afaeunge Mesias, Yunani afaeunge Kristus.)
Andreas yae Simon Petrusre yaweungehoke Yesusle bokore ekete.

Yesus Simonde ereungekoke wa weunge, “Weyae Simon, Yohanesle kelu, mana yara ware Kefas yae ro ronayewete” (Kefas Aram afaeunge nanembai Petrus Yunani afaeunge bele. Kefas bele Petrus bele na mekai ruka).
Ya heuboke mo, Yesus Galilea kanira kulun wende endere a eleukoke. Nebei hee yae Yesus oro molouboke bele Filipusbe hubayeikoke. Yesus yae Filipusre weunge, “Raei moisa hakoibo.”
Nebei Filipus Batsaida yona ro, nane merau Andreasle Petrusle naei yo mbai.

Nebeisa Filipus eke Natanielre hubayeikokete mo weunge, “Na bere Musa Allah a ukeunge wali heere foloukoke homone moloukoke. Musa bele Allahle yenjo kayaayo bele Wali Ondofolo naeise homone moloukoke. Nda hee meyae Nare andehubayeukoke. Neyae Yesus, Nazaret yona Yusufle kelu.”
Nataniel yae Filipusre hineunge, “Nazaret yora foi naei kayeero na hului mende?”
Filipus yae weunge, “Mei ba, wenaei ijoko yae meinyereibo.”
Nataniel nahaufa melere Yesus erekeunge, Natanielle abe elele, “Erenne, Allah mere baele Israel yohona hele mele, ame-ame ban kiyae.”
Nataniel yae Yesusre weunge, “Weyae naendae mekai yae raei u mekai ma roufebokae?”
Yesus yae weunge, “Filipus ware ekaeneikoi hee, Reyae na bere erekawale weyae ara no keleene nekeyae.”
Nataniel yae weunge, “Guru, Weyae Allahle Kelu, Israel kanina ro miyae naei Ondofolo.”
Yesus yae weunge, “Reyae na bere ara no keleene weyae nekeyae erekawale a eleukokale aerene Rare hila rabo halaerae. Weyae iwau emere-emere emekai bele nda yakaubokalera mokorelebe weyae ewerende.”

Benen Yesus yae weunge, “Nana heselebe wawale, Reyae Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyae. Wa ijoko yae ewerende yaku wewe kongkonde Allahle malaikat yoni-yoni Raei bokore onate inyate konayende.”
Ya bee nekaikoke mo, Kana yo Galilea kanine ro miyaere yeiboke eraman bulau mokaibokene Yesus nenake nebeinye nangkele.
Yesus na moisa orowate yo bele nebei eraman bulau mokaibokere riyaimihike ekate.
Anggur bu anewatebe baeufokene, nenake meke Yesusre weunge, “Kelu, nda yo anggur bube baeumihoke.”
Yesus yae weunge, “Ana, Raei uware yakarebonde ya namman donbe. Nebeise mokorebondere rahene Rare warae!”
Nebeibe Yesus nenake yae nebei raman bulaunge kalia mokowate yore weumi, “Naei are ungembe huluinye nendon mokombombe.”
Rukara mokaikoke hele kaban mehinen mbai nebeinye honate, neinye bu 100 literre rileikoyate hului. Nebei hele Yahudi naei era hena hului orore mere kuinyate naei.
Yesus nebei raman bulaunge kaliare mokowate yore weumi, “Nebei helene bu rilengko!” Nebei yo bu rilaikoke, hele na mehinen mbainye maemae kaikoke.
Nebeisa Yesus nebei yore weumi, “Eraman bulaufe be neiboi kiyaere ebi ken rengkombe yennele hubansinde.”
Nebei yo raeikoke ekate ikainyele.

Bu hosoro anggurre yeuboke hubaufike bae, ma hi wanen hubaunge (neyae isian nda yeubokere, nebei kaliare mokowate yo yae mo naeisaei). Nebeinye eraman bulaufe mokouboke ro na molore kaeneungekoke meke wa,

weunge, “Honoyele huluinye anggur yu bele kayeero yae bere waheikoyaimi. Nebeinya ro miyae helen anenaisindene yun yambi-yambi konatera wa hungkae-hungkae wahaeimi erabe. Nebeibe weyae ayeufakae honowole nda hee yae wa yu bele kayeero na moisa wahaemae.”
Galilea kanine Kana yone Yesus rambun emere-emere mokowole nolora, nda niyae naei bere hele. Nda iwau wae naei nene waewae yakauboke nane merau Naei moisa orowate yo Nare hila rabo halewate.
Nebei raman bulau baeufokera Yesus kulun uke Kapernaum yore nenake yae, nauwake wa yae nane merau na moisa orate yo bele nanembaisa ewate. Kapernaum yone ya name hului nekaikoke.

((Mesir kanine Allah yae Yahudi naei bena kelu fa-fare hole moloumiboke hee u bene nekeisi-nekeisi naeise Yahudi ro miyae mokoiboyate)) ya kaban Paskah nobeungekokene Yesus oro molouboke Yerusalem yore ewole.

Yerusalemna Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyaene hili era akau erare ongkoufe felenaibonde naei obo yoku sapi, domba, aye merpati naise hewate yo bele Yahudi naei roi yae yo meiko-meiko yo naei roise bulewate yo bele Yesus hubayaeikoke.

Yesus bonde heraeyemmile naei erahuae ha yae mokouboke. Nebeisa Neyae obo yoku naise hewate yo heraewoumi, roise ei buke mei buke baete anuwau na roi bele feleisayeunge kani ranne here ware weiboyole. Nda yo bele obo yoku bele nanemene Allahle ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyae houfa hukeumi baleyate.
Aye merpati naise hewate yore Yesus weumi, “Nda anuwaufa mai rambun nanemene yarongko! Maekore eise molainye imae mayae rambun nai hei-sei anuwaufe omokoijae hele!”

Nebei mekai bewatene, na moisa orowate yo Allahle homofaene molaikoke abe bene nekeumihike. Nebei a nda wanen molaikoke, “Allah, Waei ei mom-mom imae kena kaban sele kale, na hibi-hibi u benene nekenaisele.”
Yahudi yun-jun a elae yae Yesusre wainye, “Weyae nebei me u mokoubonde kiyae wanen naise hewate yore heraeyeumihikaere maere iwau wanen keleumebonde naeise rambun emere-emere mokoibo eremabon!”
Yesus yae weumi, “Allahre ei mom-mom imae nda hebele kalambo. Reyae ya name mo nda hebele ma na hului arennunde.”
Nebeibe Yahudi ro miyae yae wainye, “Ralo yakama rorele u bee mehine mbai bele (46) Allahre ei mom-mom imae na kaban sele kiyae ro miyae ainyunuke. Weyae ya name lon mae benen aungunundere?”
Nebeibe Yesus Na uwa naeibe Allahre ei mom-mom imae yae ahuneuboke Yahudi ro miyaere uwoumi.

Mainyekeukoke Yesus nulu yo mahe yora aunguke hee yae wa na moisa orowate yo Allahre ei mom-mom imaere Yesus naei uwane ahuneuboke eleukokebe bene nekeumihike, nane merau Allahle homofae na a belere Yesus uwoumi a belere hila rabo halewate.
Paskah ya kaban kowate hee Yesus namman Yerusalem yone nekewole. Rambun emere-emere mokowole erewainyene, ro miyae helen na hele yae elewate nda Kiyae Niyae Wali Ondofolo.
Nebeibe Yesus yae bae nebei ro miyae naei a elatere rabore ehalei sului, rabuhine ban ro helen miyae helen naei u mekai ame-amere roumibokene.
Ro miyae naei u mekai mbemba mbemba Yesusre ehuweikoisebe, nebeibe ro miyae naei u mekai Yesus naeisaei. Rabuhine ban nebei ro miyae naei kena ei bele Yesus ninae isaeyeubokene.
Yahudi naei yoyo koseyo holona ro mbai Farisi holone hakouboke na ro Nikodemus.

Ya mbai be baheuboke yae Yesusle bokore meke mo weunge, “Guru, meyae maeisaei Weyae Allah yae ukete ro miyaere isaeise keleumilere mekae Kiyae, rabuhine ban Allah Ware ei haweitene nebei rambun emere-emere Weyae mokoyae. Nebei me u ma ro miyae hi yae omokoiboi sului.”
Yesus yae weunge, “Reyae na helebe wawale, ro miyae nde maenin wayeu fa honate wanen benen Allahlera ohonoinya, nebei kiyae Raei me kelee u keleena nekate wali foi moi ehubaikoi sului.”
Nikodemus yae weunge, “Naendae mekai yae rorele yembonde lonbe honnate? Benen honnatere nebei kiyae na hului ban nenakele kou ei yahi einye enensinde.”

Yesus yae weunge, “Reyae na helebe wawale, ((nulu keumiboke ro miyae na kena u ma hi hele inyaibonde. Nebei yo Allahle Roh weumi are hakainye, naei bekore kena haehae katere ehakoiboi. Naei kena ure benen eme honokate wanen inyaibonde.)) Nebei wanen bewate ro miyaere bu konaimile. Nulu ekeiboi nane merau Allahle Roh aiboi ro miyae Raei me kelee u keleene nekate ro miyae holone eyeisi sului.
Ro miyaera honowate yo ro miyae u mekai yae koyate. Allahle Rohra honowate yo Allahle Roh u mekai yae koyate.
Reyae wawale, weyae benen Allahlera hononete hele a wawale aerene fa oboijae.

Allahle Roh alu wanen raweiboyolena boye naei kena hului eyewole wanen. Eyae na kulun eiborowannele, nebeibe eyae isian makeisa mele nane merau makeise endere. Nebei sului mbai Allahle Roh yae Naei kelu omi na kena u einye mokoumile.”
Nikodemus yae weunge, “Nebei a ma haraungebokae eleukokae naendae mekai yembonde?”
Yesus yae weunge, “Weyae Israel ro miyaere isaei hebaende kelaeumi holona ro na hi niyae. Nebeibe nebei a wawalere isian a lon mae warae!
Na helebe nda a wawale, Meyae maeisaeise nekande abe wayembe nane merau meyae ijoko yae erekande abe isaeyaeyembe. Nebeibe maei a isaeimambere mayae ro miyae na helere eleikoi kaube.
Nda kani kelana ro miyae nolone baete rambun abe mare huwamalebe mayae na helere eleikoi kaube. Naendae mekai yae mare surga naei rambun are ufembene mayae na hele elengkombe?
Ro miyae hi yae ha yae roko mbai surgare ei mo. Reyae, Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyae, mo surgane eweufikale.

Na bere Allahle yendo kayaalo Musa yae a kala-kalane rami yae akewate ro miyae hole molommibondere rami tembagara mokaibokebe one neungejeke. Nebei sului mbai Reyae, Allahle bokora mekale ro miyae uware yeubokale Kiyae, bumane nenaisijende hele.
Ro miyae nanemene Rare hila rabo halenaisele yo wali hena bona enaiyaronde naeise Reyae bumane nenaisijende.

Allah yae nda kani kelana ro miyaere kena buhae u buhae kaban hewoumi aerene Reyae Na Kelu mbai ken sele kinyeumiboke. Nde maenin mae Raei a elalere hila rabo halensele kiyae Allah bele ewaheikoi nebeibe wali hena bona endowende naeise, Reyae hererelere Allah ukeufe mekale.
Ro miyaere me noremiyonde naeise ban, nebeibe naeinya hesele nda kani kelana ro miyae holere moloremibonde naeise, Allah na Kelu Reyae nda kani kelare ukeufe mekale.

Nde yae Raei a elalere hila rabo halenselena, me onoyoi nekenate. Nebeibe nde yae hila rabo Raei a elalere ehaleinya, Allah yae me nokounge. Rabuhine ban nebei ro miyae Reyae Allahle Kelu mbai kende hila rabo ehaleinye.

“Nda u mekai aerene ro miyae ehee bukulu emminoyonde: Allahle wali hena wali nibi ako faeuko hehere naemmile wanen nda kani kelare meke. Nebeibe ro miyae nebei ako faeuko ahi, nebeibe ouben hauben nolone wanen nekenatere kena kowate, rabuhine ban me u beko mokowatene.

Wali beko bako mokoyate ro miyae Allahle wali hena wali nibire ikele kainye. Nebei wali nibi Reyae kelaemaelere ahi hele, rabuhine ban hehe naeikoyele wanen naei me u mokate naei mare yakammibonde belene.
Nebeibe nde na helere mo baete ro miyae Raei kelaemaele wali nibire hakoyainye. Nebei nibi yae hehe ouben hauben nolone naemmile wanen mae naei me u Allahle walora mokatere na yaka yakanaimile.”
Nebeisa Yesus na moisa orowate yo bele Yerusalem yora kulun ukate Yudea kanire ewate. Ya heki ban Yudea kanine nanembainye nekewate, ro miyaere bu kowoumi.
Salim yo kelaeunga anuwau mbai na ro Ainon. Nebei ijenne Yohanes bure koumi kiyae ro miyaere bu kowoumi, rabuhine ban bu helenne nane merau ro miyae helen nebei anuwaufe bure kommilere hokoumekene.
Nebei hee Yohanes namman kawa einye eiseikoi.
Yohanes na moisa orowate yo bele Yahudi ro mbai bele Yahudi naei era hena bu kui-kui naei a kenane kilewate.

Nebei yo ekate Yohanesre wainye, “Guru, aengkele nanembainye hebewande Ro naei weyae are isaeiwamae Kiyae, nda hee Yordan wi bonei ndi reufine nebei Ro bu ekekoumi. Naei bokore ro miyae nemene fomene hokoyele.”
Yohanes yae weumi, “Ro miyae naei angken nuwei Allah wennele hului mo nuwenate.
Reyae isaeiwamale a boraukoke mo, ‘Reyae Wali Ondofolo ban, nebeibe rare ukeufele Neyae menderene bere holo yae mekale.’ ”

Yohanes nda a wanen mae ahuneuboke, “Miyae neme weiboyainye nebei rore weiboyainye kiyaele miyae. Nebei ro naei kahili wafeu na bokone ayeufake hebele ro, nane ro neme miyae neme wainyeboke rei kole a boroukokene kena foi sele hubaunge. Nebei sului mbai reyae hubanale. Nda hee nebei Ro neme mekene Raei kena rei mai yae eufemeleke.
Nebei Kiyae bereise erenainyele, rare moise yae bulenaisende.”

Yohanes namman huwele, “Neyae surgara meke ro miyaene, nde maenin horo, hi yae ha yae Nare ehameikoi. Reyae nda kani kelara nulaisebokene raei isaei hebaen nda kani kelana rambun-rambun naei mo raeisaei.
Yesus surgara meke Kiyae naei ijoko yae erewole naei angkaei yae borowole abe isaeyeumibe, nebeibe ro miyae keli name hele Neyae elele are hila rabo halaete.
Yesus isaeyeumi are hila rabo halaete yo na hele yae elate Allah na hele a mo weume.
Allah ndare ukeunge meke Kiyae Allahlena ako faeuko mo weumile, rabuhine ban Allahle Roh na hibi-hibi nebei Kiyaere elae yae kiteyeunge.
Ako Allah na Kelure kena buhae heunge, nane merau Ako Naei me einye u einye rambun yoni-yoni na Kelu me eise kinyewounge hakewounge.

Allahle Kelu Naei a elelere hila rabo halende ro miyae wali hena bona hubayeunge. Nebeibe ro miyae nde Allahle Kelure moi bulennele wali hena bona eyereiboi. Nebei ro miyae Allah na hibi-hibi ehee bukulu hubayeunge.”
Farisi holona borowate, ro miyae helen sele Yesusre hakowainye nane merau bu kowoumi. Ro miyae name keli mo Yohanesre hakowainye.
Naeinya hesele Yesus Nenaeijae ro miyaere bu okoi, na moisa orowate yo yae kowaimi.
Farisi holona nda a borokate Yesus isaeyeubokene, Yudea kani nukeungeboke beufoke Galilea kanire ewole.
Naei ende nibi Samaria kanira hele nensande fondere.
Samaria kanina yo mbai Sikarre eke. Nebei yo kelaeunge nendahina Yahudi ro miyae naei yobe kaban Yakob yae kani ebi na kelu Yusufre kinyeungeboke.
Nebeinye Yakuble rotebu (bu hele) yale. Nibi a ahau mewolene Yesus nauwa yambi koloukeungene nore yengkondere rotebu kelaunge eunuweuboke. Nebei hee hu yaukanne hului.
Nebeinye nekele yae Samariana miyae mbai bu reikoise meke. Yesus yae weunge, “Rare bu yeise anerehin.”
Yesus nembai nekele, na moisa orowate yo raman yarokoise yo eise ekate.

Nebeibe nda Samaria miyae yae weunge, “Ae, na ijen ban sele weyae Yahudi ro reyae Samariana miyae lonbe bure aneufindere mekaeriyarae?” (Rabuhine ban Yahudi ro miyae yae Samaria ro miyaere ele moinya yae me baeyaimine.)

Yesus yae weunge, “Allah yae ro miyaere aere ban mae foi yeyeumi nane merau Reyae ware bu andehindere riyawale Kiyae Allah yae ukeufe mekale. Nebei a isaeyeubokaena, weyae Rare wali bele bu riyeufehinde, ware walire yeumi bu isete.”
Nebei miyae yae weunge, “Tuhan, nda rotebu wauwau, Weyae bure rekonde mongkon u lonbe. Makeisa nebei walire yeumi bu rowele?
Naendae wanen waei u benera nekayete Weyae kaban sele maei yobe Yakoblera? Rotebu mo kinyeumeboke, neyae, naei kelu omi, naei obo yoku, naei orona mena bele aneimeyande.”
Yesus yae weunge, “Nde yae nda bu anensinde benen buki ennehubande,
nebeibe Reyae isende bu anensinde Kiyae bukire ehubasi nekenende. Reyae isende bu yae anensindera nauwa einye bu no wanen yembonde, na hibi-hibi rilennende, wali hena bona hubannende.”
Nda miyae yae Yesusre weunge, “Tuhan, bukibe korele belene, nebei bu yeise, bure nda anuwaunge benen ereyei.”
Yesus yae weunge, “Eye, wa molo kaeneungekonde ndare mebe.”
Nda miyae yae weunge, “Reyae ro ban molo ban ma.”
Yesus yae benende weunge, “Na helebe eleyae, Weyae na hele ro ban molo ban.
Weyae ro maehae mbai nekaukoke, nda haeinya waei bele nekeube nebei waei ro molo ban. Nebei wanenne nda a elalene weyae na helebe eleukokae.”
Nda miyae yae weunge, “Tuhan, mana na yaka hele reyae hubanale, na hele Weyae yendo kayaalo na hi niyae.
Maei yobe naei kamahe naei nekayeke nda mokone Allahre ei molainyeke, nebeibe mayae Yahudi ro miyae yae elaube Yerusalem yo mbai nebei anuwaunge mo eyae Allahre eise molomanele hele.”
Yesus yae weunge, “Rare hila rabo haleise! Na ya bele hu bele mende, mayae Ako Allahre nda mokone ei molonnele ban nane merau Yerusalem yone ban.
Mayae Samaria ro miyae nendon rore oroiboi Allahbe ei molaunge. Meyae Yahudi ro miyae eise molannele Allah meyae rore rannele Kiyae, rabuhine ban Yahudi naei nolora aere hole molommele Kiyae mekene.

Nebeibe Allah roh ma yae nekele, ro miyae kena u einye a elele borole. Nda hee Allah yae Naei na hele a ro miyae kena u einye yakayeumi. Allahre ei molonainyelere ro miyae Naei kena u einye ei molonainyele hele nane merau Neyae keleumi na hele wali nibi a hului nekenate. Nebei u mekai ma ro miyaere Allah baele.”

Nebeibe Allah roh ma yae nekele, ro miyae kena u einye a elele borole. Nda hee Allah yae Naei na hele a ro miyae kena u einye yakayeumi. Allahre ei molonainyelere ro miyae Naei kena u einye ei molonainyele hele nane merau Neyae keleumi na hele wali nibi a hului nekenate. Nebei u mekai ma ro miyaere Allah baele.”

Nda miyae yae Yesusre weunge, “Reyae raeisaei nekale Allah yae oro umaufe heraweungeboke ro Wali Ondofolo Kiyae mendere. Neyae mende heena nemene fomene ninae aere yakammekonde.” (Na ro Ibrani afaeunge Mesias.)
Yesus yae weunge, “Nane Kiyae mbai Reyae Niyae, wangkele are faeufe eleyonde mbai Niyae.”

Nebei hee yae Yesus na moisa orowate yo baeiboke mekate. Yesus miyae mbai bele ane elete erainyene fa yae bate. Naei kena une nda a hinewainye, “Rahere baeyae? Rahe abe eleubere?” nebeibe a ewei mo hebate.
Nebei miyae na habure mo nebei anuwaunge raufike, nebeisa yore habeleweke, ro miyaere weumi,
“Aka naei baeke naei memerembo, ndina ro mbai Neyae Wali Ondofolo era. Raei u mekai wa mekai kowekale nanemene hele yakaufekoke.”
Nebei yona ro miyae aibaleke Yesusle bokore ewate.
Nebei miyae ewole mon na moisa orowate yo yae Yesusre uwainye, “Guru, eraman aneiko ba.”
Nebeibe Yesus yae weumi, “Raei eraman honaisele, nebei naeise mayae maisaei ban.”
Na moisa orowate yo hi yae hire hineunge, “Naendae wanen, Neyae anengkonde eraman ro miyae roukate mekatene era?”
Yesus yae weumi, “Reyae andekonde eraman nda niyae: Allah Rare ukeufe mekale Naei kenare kole hului mokorekonde nane merau Rare kinyeufeboke kalia riyau ufembonde.

((Yesus Naei kalia mokowole bele era bolu hekene moloisayate ani hokoikoyate bele ahuneungeboke.)) Mayae nda a mekai eyelewaubebe ya, ‘Benen oko keli nekemakonde anire hokomale ya mensembonde.’ Nebeibe Reyae mare wamale, enere faise ijoko eren! Nda kani kelane ro miyae heke yoni-yoni fae yangko-yangko wanen yaeiboke. Fae yangko-yangko yoni-yoni mokainyehake hokonatere yaeiboke wanen mbai ro miyae mokainyehake Raei a elalere boronate hila rabo halenate.

Nda hee anire maluwate yo na roibu yarate. Naei hokate rambun wali hena bonare enaiyaronde ro miyae. Nebei mekai yaere Allahle wali nibi kelaeimi ro miyae nemene rei mai konate. Neyae bolure molate yo bele anire maluwate yo bele wanen yaeiboke.
Nebei mekai yaere nda a na hele yembonde, ‘Hi yae molonde hi yae maluwembonde.’
Reyae ukamale mayae omoloikoi anuwaungare ensokombere. Ro miyae hiwa aimoloukoke, mayae ekaube nebei yo yae bolu molaikoke na anibe ensokombe.”
Nebei Samaria kanina miyae yae elewole, “Raei u mekai wa mekai mokowale Yesus nanemene weufekoke.” Neyae a isaeiwoumine Samaria yona ro miyae helen Yesusre na hele Wali Ondofolo yae elewate.
Samaria ro miyae Yesusle bokore mekate mo Nare moi hurewainye nebei yo bokone nekendere. Nebeinye ya bee hele Yesus nebei yo bele nekaikoke.
Benen ro miyae helen sele Yesus elewole are boraikokene Nare hila rabo halewainye.

Nebei yona ro miyae nda maengkere wainye, “Meyae hila rabo halaenne weyae uwamae a aerene mo ban. Rabuhine ban menaeijae Naei euwara elewole a borandekokene nane merau maeisaei Neyae nana hesele nda kani kela hole moloiboi naei Ro.”
Ya bee Sikar yone nekeukokera mo, Yesus Naei Galilea kanire ewole.
(Yesus naei euwara Nenaeijae eleukoke, “Yendo kayaalo mbai na yone yanne foi yae ei ehawei, nebeinye ro miyae nare be ehinei.”)
Nebei hee Galilea kanire eke bae, nebeinya ro miyae na kena u foi moi sele ei hauwainye. Paskah ya kaban Yerusalem yone ekate nenaei Yesus na me u mokowolere ijoko yae erewainye.

Nebeisa benen Yesus bukeufike Galilea kanina Kana yore honolere meke, bere bu hosoro ukeunge anggur bure yeuboke ijende. Kapernaum yona ro mbai Ondofolo Herodesle kaliare mokowole ro na kelu erane kowole.
Neyae borouboke Yesus Yudea kanira Galilea kanire mekene bae, eke Yesusre riwounge Kapernaum yore mende na fa era hereinyen-hereinyen kowole onomire inyendere.
Yesus nda rore weunge, “Mayae rambun emere-emere ijoko ereiboinye Reyae Wali Ondofolo yeubokalere mayae hila rabo ehalei sului.”
Ondofolo Herodesle kaliare mokole ro yae weunge, “Tuhan, u hale yae mele raei fa neherei yae.”
Yesus yae weunge, “Eye! Wa fa ninae onomi rouke.”
Nda ro Yesusle ane faeunge hakouboke na hibi ewole.
Nibi nolone nare ewole mo na yebaei bubaei be huhu baikoke. Mekate wainye, “Wa fa ninae onomi rouke.”
Nebeinye nda yore hineumi, “Makei haei yae uwa naume hireungeboke?”
Nda yo yae wainye, “Wena rai hujoko mbainye u naume hireungeboke.”
Naeko na u bene meungenekeufike na hele nebei haei yae Yesus a ukeunge, “Wa fa onomi rouke.” Nebeinye na miyae fa-fa na imae ei obe einya yo bele nemene Yesusre hila rabo halewainye.
Yudea kanira Yesus bukeufike Galilea kanine meke heera Neyae rambun emere-emere mokowolera roko bee nendo mokouboke.
Mainyekeukoke mo, Yahudi naei ya kaban na raman bulau belene, Galilea kanira Yesus kulun uke Yerusalem yore ewole.
Yerusalem yore yanainyekoke ele dombare yawaimi ate romau kelaeunge bukou mbai yale, Ibrani afaeunge Betesda yae wainye. Nebeinye baengko bele norofa maehae mbai yan mae haeikoke.
Nebei anuwaunge ro miyae nekai sele era buloona yo, ijoko kumba yo, oro rebeisi-rebeisi yo, oro mere nimewaimile yo bele honate.
Rabuhine ban roko mbemba Allahle malaikat oyowole nebei bukou na bu neunge kuba eyakowole. Nde yae bere oro molombonde enensinde kiyae era buloo naendae wanen horore, na hului onomi rowende.
Nebei anuwaunge ro mbai ralo yakama 38 hele era buloo koweke.
Yesus nebei ro honowolere erewounge hee, nebei u mekai mo yae heki hele honowekere isaeyeubokene nda rore Yesus yae hineunge, “Weyae onomi rowelere kena koyae?”
Nebei ro yae weunge, “Tuhan, ndana ro miyae bu eyakowole heene rare rowensele nda bukou eise hansebonde naeise u. Renaeijae nebei bure nakeleyale hee hiwa yo moi woyaisele bena eyakoikoyate.”
Yesus yae weunge, “Ainyu wa kewa yumake yaroiko aloinyoko eye.”
Nebei hee yae nda ro onomi rouke, na kewa yumakere mo yaroukoke aloungekoke ewole.
Nda rambun Sabat ya yeuboke.
Nebeinye Yahudi ro miyae yae onomire rouke rore wainye, “Mana Sabat ya. Aei Yahudi naei wali heere foloukoke homo huluinye Sabat yane kewa yumake ekaeiboi ei sului.”
